ADD_COLUMN_SQL: ALTER TABLE "%s" ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS "%s" %s
ADD_FK_SQL: ALTER TABLE "%s" ADD CONSTRAINT "%s_%s_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("%s") REFERENCES "%s" ("%s")
DROP_FK_SQL: ALTER TABLE "%s" DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS "%s_%s_fkey" CASCADE
DROP_PK_SQL: ALTER TABLE "%s" DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS "%s_pkey" CASCADE
ALTER_COLUMN_TYPE_SQL: ALTER TABLE "%s" ALTER COLUMN "%s" TYPE %s USING "%s"::%s
SET_COLUMN_NULLABLE_SQL: ALTER TABLE "%s" ALTER COLUMN "%s" %s NOT NULL
CREATE_SEQ_SQL: CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS "%s" START 1 INCREMENT 1
DROP_COLUMN_UNIQUE_SQL: ALTER TABLE "%s" DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS "%s_%s_key" CASCADE
DROP_UNIQUE_SQL: ALTER TABLE "%s" DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS "%s_unique" CASCADE
